title: Death Dealer
text: Have at me you bastard!
effecta: Make Menas exhausted to discard (not burn!) any foe at the same location.

title: Rugged Terrain
text: You people have gone soft.
effecta: Add one to a test when Menas is in a wilderness location.

title: Rugged Terrain
text: You people have gone soft.
effecta: Add one to a test when Menas is in a wilderness location.

title: Grudging Respect
text: She can be so infuriating - and she's usually right.
effecta: If Thea is at the same location, make Menas angry to remove 4 xxDISCORD from Menas's party.

title: Grudging Respect
text: She can be so infuriating - and she's usually right.
effecta: If Thea is at the same location, make Menas angry to remove 4 xxDISCORD from Menas's party.

title: Call to Action
text: What took you so long?
effecta: You may take 1 xxDISCORD to move a character to Menas's location.

title: Call to Action
text: What took you so long?
effecta: You may take 1 xxDISCORD to move a character to Menas's location.

title: Contingency Plan
text: This will hold for now.
effecta: Spend 1 xxORE to discard (not burn!) any threat.

title: Contingency Plan
text: This will hold for now.
effecta: Spend 1 xxORE to discard (not burn!) any threat.

title: Cut out of Wood
text: It's not as bad as it looks.
effecta: Attach to Menas. Cancel the next xxBODY condition Menas would take, then discard this card.

title: Defensive Maneuver
text: Better to fight when the odds are in our favor.
effecta: Attach to a wilderness location. If an obstacle would be attached to the location, discard the obstacle instead.

title: Shoot the Messenger
text: Why the ever loving fuck did you let things get so bad?
effecta: xxIMMEDIATE If Fuscus is in the same location as Menas, both Fuscus and Menas are angry.

title: Shared Vision
text: The Sunriders know how to handle The Empire.
effecta: Gain xxFORTUNE equal to Sunrider disposition.

title: Pillow Talk
text: It wasn't my best performance, but I learned something useful.
effecta: Take 2 xxDISCORD to remove one xxAPOTHEOSIS.

title: Soft Pity
text: Fine. I hope that rigid code keeps you warm at night.
effecta: Add one to a test if Thea is at the same location.

title: Soft Pity
text: Fine. I hope that rigid code keeps you warm at night.
effecta: Add one to a test if Thea is at the same location.

title: Market Manipulations
text: A little of this for a lot of that.
effecta: Spend 1 xxLUXURY to reroll any resource dice of one type.

title: Market Manipulations
text: A little of this for a lot of that.
effecta: Spend 1 xxLUXURY to reroll any resource dice of one type.

title: Party Monster
text: My liver is angry, but my head is happy.
effecta: Give Fuscus a physical condition to remove 4 xxDISCORD from Fuscus's party.

title: Party Monster
text: My liver is angry, but my head is happy.
effecta: Give Fuscus a physical condition to remove 4 xxDISCORD from Fuscus's party.

title: Scenic Route
text: Sometimes you need to stop and smell the roses.
effecta: Take a xxPSYCHE condition to cancel one xxTIMER. Draw another mission card, and then shuffle the xxTIMER card back into the mission deck.

title: Scenic Route
text: Sometimes you need to stop and smell the roses.
effecta: Take a xxPSYCHE condition to cancel one xxTIMER. Draw another mission card, and then shuffle the xxTIMER card back into the mission deck.

title: Bad Influence
text: Seriously kid? You don't like wine and beautiful women?
effecta: Take 1 xxDISCORD to add one to a test that Keel and Fuscus work together on.

title: Lavender Society
text: Know the password? Of course I know the password. This is my place!
effecta: Attach to an urban location. Any character present at the location may add one to all tests.

title: On the Grift
text: No one appreciates the breath of life like I do.
effecta: xxIMMEDIATE Spend 1 xxLUXURY or take 2 xxDISCORD.

title: Charming Host
effecta: Move one issue or diplomat to a different location at the same mission.

title: The Conciliator
text: I can't let my burdens get in the way of our goal.
effecta: Make Thea frustrated to remove 4 xxDISCORD from Thea's party.

title: Speaker for Red Bank
text: Time is short, and we must work quickly.
effecta: Add one to a test when Thea is at a Red Bank location.

title: Speaker for Red Bank
text: Time is short, and we must work quickly.
effecta: Add one to a test when Thea is at a Red Bank location.

title: Careful Plans
text: Our hard work is paying off.
effecta: Spend one resource die to gain another resource die of a different type.

title: Careful Plans
text: Our hard work is paying off.
effecta: Spend one resource die to gain another resource die of a different type.

title: Communal Feast
text: Rejoice! Rejoice! And lift your cups!
effecta: Spend 3 xxFOOD to discard an issue at the same location.

title: Communal Feast
text: Rejoice! Rejoice! And lift your cups!
effecta: Spend 3 xxFOOD to discard an issue at the same location.

title: Shared Bonds
text: I'll help where I can.
effecta: Move Thea to the same location as another character.

title: Shared Bonds
text: I'll help where I can.
effecta: Move Thea to the same location as another character.

title: Higher Purpose
text: I have seen a vision of our future. It gives me great hope.
effecta: Attach to Thea. Cancel the next xxPSYCHE condition Thea would take, then discard this card.

title: Steady Command
text: Do not give in to your fears.
effecta: Attach to Thea. Cancel a xxDISCORD trigger for Thea's mission, then discard this card.

title: Doubt
text: I'm giving it my best - and it's not enough.
effecta: xxIMMEDIATE Make Thea weary if she isn't already.

title: Divide and Conquer
text: This is a good plan. Now it's time to put it into action.
effecta: If Thea is alone at a location, add 2 xxPROGRESS to Thea's mission.

title: Work Better Alone
text: You'll just slow me down....
effecta: Add one to a test if Keel is alone at a location.

title: Tough Love
text: Okay, Okay, I get it! It won't happen again.
effecta: Add one to a test that Menas and Keel work together on.

title: Tough Love
text: Okay, Okay, I get it! It won't happen again.
effecta: Add one to a test that Menas and Keel work together on.

title: Hard Won Knowledge
text: We have to stay one step ahead of the Empire.
effecta: Spend one xxSECRETS to remove one xxAPOTHEOSIS.

title: Hard Won Knowledge
text: We have to stay one step ahead of the Empire.
effecta: Spend one xxSECRETS to remove one xxAPOTHEOSIS.

title: Trick Shot
text: I've practiced this a million times. In my head.
effecta: Take 1 xxDISCORD to add one to a test Keel is involved in.

title: Trick Shot
text: I've practiced this a million times. In my head.
effecta: Take 1 xxDISCORD to add one to a test Keel is involved in.

title: Misdirection
text: I swear I heard something. From just outside the gate.
effecta: Move a foe or guard to a different location on the same mission.

title: Misdirection
text: I swear I heard something. From just outside the gate.
effecta: Move a foe or guard to a different location on the same mission.

title: Secret Stash
text: These places are out there if you know where to look.
effecta: Spend one xxSECRETS to gain two resource dice of one type.

title: Eyes on the Prize
text: These other things are distractions.
effecta: Attach to Keel. Cancel a xxPROGRESS trigger for Keel's mission, then discard this card.

title: Overanalysis
text: We have no good choices now.
effecta: xxIMMEDIATE Attach this card to Keel. Keel loses his next action then discard this card.

title: The Graduate
text: It's time to put into action what I learned all those years toiling away in Crescent Hold.
effecta: Make Keel weary to gain one xxSECRETS.

title: Deathtouched
text: The Necromancer of North Oaks left a dark and enduring legacy behind.
effecta: If Oniri is on the same mission as this character, any xxBODY conditions this character would take are given to Oniri instead.
